quote: If any young man reads this Book aright, he becomes large-hearted. He cannot hold his soul within the narrow bound of his ribs, but his great heart looks out to see where it can scatter benefits.
quote_letters: IF ANY YOUNG MAN READS THIS BOOK ARIGHT HE BECOMES LARGE-HEARTED HE CANNOT HOLD HIS SOUL WITHIN THE NARROW BOUND OF HIS RIBS BUT HIS GREAT HEART LOOKS OUT TO SEE WHERE IT CAN SCATTER BENEFITS
